'''Radiant Spincrystal 34''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Vague Whispers]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a cargo box next to [[Jiangxue]] where he fishes at the docks of [[Wangshu Inn]].
